title: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent plant species of the genus Aloe.
care_instructions: Water every 3 weeks and keep in indirect sunlight.

title: Spider Plant
description: Easy to grow and produces arching stems with baby plants.
care_instructions: Keep soil moist and provide indirect sunlight.

title: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Popular houseplant with large, violin-shaped leaves.
care_instructions: Water weekly and provide bright, indirect light.

title: Bamboo Palm
description: Tropical plant that thrives in bright, indirect light.
care_instructions: Water regularly and maintain high humidity.

title: Peace Lily
description: Popular for its beautiful white flowers and air-purifying qualities.
care_instructions: Keep soil moist and provide indirect light.

title: Snake Plant
description: Tolerant of low light and infrequent watering.
care_instructions: Water every 2-3 weeks and keep in indirect sunlight.

title: Pothos
description: Easy to grow and known for its trailing vines.
care_instructions: Water every 1-2 weeks and provide indirect sunlight.

title: ZZ Plant
description: Tolerant of low light and drought conditions.
care_instructions: Water every 2-3 weeks and keep in indirect sunlight.

title: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Known for its large, perforated leaves.
care_instructions: Water weekly and provide bright, indirect light.

title: Rubber Plant
description: Popular for its broad, glossy leaves.
care_instructions: Water weekly and provide bright, indirect light.

title: Lavender
description: Known for its fragrant purple flowers.
care_instructions: Water weekly and provide full sunlight.

title: Rosemary
description: Aromatic herb commonly used in cooking.

title: Basil
description: Popular culinary herb known for its fragrant leaves.

title: Mint
description: Fast-growing herb with a refreshing scent.

title: Oregano
description: Aromatic herb often used in Mediterranean cuisine.

title: Chives

title: Thyme

title: Parsley
description: Versatile herb used as a garnish and seasoning.

title: Dill
description: Aromatic herb often used in pickling.

title: Cilantro
